course_description: This course will build on historical foundations of genetics to critically explore the structure and function of genes and genomics using molecular biology tools through a human perspective using problem solving and reading of primary scientific literature.
prerequisites: (BIOL 142 and BIOL 142L) or BIOL_OX 142WE or equivalent transfer credit as a prerequisite.
